Question: Leopard Imaging CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Leopard Imaging Inc.

Product: LI-AR0830-YUV-MIPI and LI-AR2020-MIPI cameras powered by onsemi Hyperlux™ LP AR0830 and AR2020 sensors

- State-of-the-art embedded cameras powered by onsemi Hyperlux™ LP AR0830 and AR2020 sensors
- Sensors capture images in linear or enhanced Dynamic Range (eDR) modes with rolling−shutter readout
- Architected to deliver high−quality performance consuming very low power
- Supported by a 1.4 μm BSI pixel from onsemi, providing excellent optical performance in low light & NIR wavelengths
- Powerful data capturing device at the edge, programmable through several options to deliver optimal bandwidth at very low power
- Well-received by customers with applications in automation, robotics, A-IoT, drones, etc.
Summary_cn:
美洲豹影像有限公司

产品：由onsemi Hyperlux™ LP AR0830和AR2020传感器驱动的LI-AR0830-YUV-MIPI和LI-AR2020-MIPI相机

- 最先进的嵌入式相机，由onsemi Hyperlux™ LP AR0830和AR2020传感器驱动
- 传感器以滚动快门读出方式捕捉线性或增强动态范围（eDR）模式下的图像
- 构建为以极低功耗提供高质量性能的设备
- 由onsemi提供的1.4 μm BSI像素支持，在低光和近红外波长下提供出色的光学性能
- 在边缘进行强大的数据捕捉，可通过多种选项进行编程，以在极低功耗下提供最佳带宽
- 在自动化、机器人技术、人工物联网、无人机等领域受到客户的良好评价
